trans-unit.source: Determines the output files for non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.
trans-unit.target: Determina i file di output per non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] i riferimenti al progetto.

trans-unit.source: The `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` task searches for a special property set by the [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE for the list of project GUIDs and their associated outputs.
trans-unit.target: Il `ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput` esegue la ricerca di una proprietà speciale impostata dall'attività di [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] IDE per l'elenco di GUID di progetto e di output associati.

trans-unit.source: The IDE only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects and in this way separates [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references from non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] references.
trans-unit.target: L'IDE di pre-consente di risolvere solo non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti e in questo modo separa [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetto i riferimenti non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti.

trans-unit.source: The IDE returns the list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects as UnresolvedProjectReferences.
trans-unit.target: L'IDE restituisce l'elenco di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti come UnresolvedProjectReferences.

trans-unit.source: This enables the task to use more powerful [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] mechanisms to manipulate just the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references, such as.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo l'attività usi più potenti [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] meccanismi per modificare solo il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] riferimenti, ad esempio al progetto.

trans-unit.source: calling into specific targets of references to get the manifest file name, which would not be possible with a mixed list of [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] and non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project references.
trans-unit.target: la chiamata a destinazioni specifiche di riferimenti per ottenere il nome del file manifesto, che non sarebbe possibile con un elenco misto di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] e non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] i riferimenti al progetto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ResolveNonMSBuildProjectOutput"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'esecuzione dell'attività riesce. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una stringa XML contenente l'output di progetto risolti.

trans-unit.source: An XML string containing resolved project outputs.
trans-unit.target: Stringa XML contenente output di progetto risolti.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi di riferimento di progetto originale.

trans-unit.source: The resolved reference paths that preserve the original project reference attributes.
trans-unit.target: Percorsi di riferimento risolti che conservano gli attributi di riferimento di progetto originale.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta gli elementi di riferimento di progetto che sono nel [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.

trans-unit.source: Since [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] only pre-resolves non-[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] projects, the project reference items that could not be resolved using the pre-resolved list of outputs are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Poiché [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] solo pre-risolve non[!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] progetti, gli elementi di riferimento di progetto che non è possibile risolvere utilizzando l'elenco prerisolto di output presenti il [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.

trans-unit.source: Project reference items that are in the [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] format.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi di riferimento contenuti nel progetto di [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] formato.
